## Exercise
### Function
Run the following code in the R console:
```{r}
n <- 1000
x <- seq(1,n)
sum(x)
```

Based on the result, what do you think the functions _seq_ and _sum_ do? You can use the help system.
## Instruction
### Answer
* seq creates a list of numbers and sum adds them up.
